extendedInfo.description: Do you want to learn to draw, but donât know how to do it?Sketch your favorite celebrities face such as Amitabh Bachchan, Indian latest released movie Chennai Express movie star Shahrukh Khan ,Yo Yo Honey Singh,Michael Jackson, Lady Gaga, and Brad Pitt? How to Draw: Celebrities android app for you to design or sketch your favorite celebrities . Favorite Indian celebrities & Hollywood celebrities is next to series of drawing apps.Learn how to draw will improve your skill in very less time with the help of our simple android application. Whether you're an art teacher, art student, or just a hobbyist artist you will find the step by step education that will give you the ability to bring those images in your mind into paper reality .Even kids can also use this & they will learn a lot with lots of fun. Thatâs why learning to draw is very interesting android application.How to design: Celebrities app includes a collection of tutorials for drawing the most revered celebrities on the planet. This app help you to draw celebrities in all categories like musicians, actors, actresses, singers, or even a political figure . Your favorite is sure to be available in this app. You can choose one, two, three, or all of the celebrities to draw. The choice is yours!This drawing application is completely free & no internet connection required to draw.CELEBRITIES to which you are going to draw âof famous personalities of the universe
